entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:43AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED WATER LEVELS EXPECTED FOR KUSKOKWIM DELTA COAST TODAY AND FRIDAY... A strong frontal system is expected to bring southerly gale force winds with gusts up to 45 to 55 mph across the Kuskokwim Delta coast today and Friday. The resulting higher seas and surf coinciding with high tide could raise water levels 2 to 5 feet
entry.cap:areaDesc: Kuskokwim Delta

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:35PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Thursday Afternoon Through Saturday... Elevated surf is expected to develop along north facing coastlines through the Bering Strait on Thursday afternoon and continue into Saturday. This includes the communities of Gambell and Savoonga.
